name: RE.W.I.N.D
description:
Story:

Welcome to the research of While Interruption and Demolition: Project RE.W.I.N.D
You are R#47-1. The 47th robot prototyp of the first generation. Your task is the usage of our world changing new technology to solve some simple puzzles. But like everything in the world, time can be unpredictable. Do not worry, if something goes wrong. Unlike the alphabet numbers are infinity.

< Building a runtime has lead to several errors >

____________________

Gameplay:

Reach the goal in this puzzle-platformer by rewind time.
Find the keycard hidden in a box and get to the teleporter.
Use switches and buttons to change the enviroment.

____________________

Control:

A, D: Move left and right.
W, Space: Jump
E: Use lever, pick up key card, activate teleporter
C: Set Checkpoint
Left Shift: Use the Rewind
Tabulator: See Map
Backspace: Reset level
Q: Open menu

____________________

Goal: Collect the key card hidden in a box and bring it to the teleporter. Sometimes, you have to rewind time to reach your goal.

____________________

Coding: Markus
Graphic Design: Fabian
Music: Pascal
